name.question: Which of the following statements correctly describe data and data analysis? Select all that apply
answer: Data is a collection of facts
One goal of data analysis is to drive informed decision-making
Transforming data is part of the data analysis process
Data analysis is the creation of data
correct_answer: One goal of data analysis is to drive informed decision-making
Data is a collection of facts
Transforming data is part of the data analysis process

name.question: Data science is creating new ways of _____ and understanding the unknown by using raw data
